APPLI CATION FOR MEMBERSHI P – NOTES
Details of CIRM members hip, fee s tructure and procedures are s et out in CIRM’s Articl es of 
Ass oci ation and Rol es whi ch should be read in th eir en tire ty be fore si gn ature . N ew

is fi nal. Cri teri a for members hip are appli ed as follows ( as noted i n the CIRM Rul es):
Full Member ship: open to any private organiz ation or company being a corporation whi ch
has a s eparate l egal pers onali ty, is i n the manufacture, s ervi ce or operati on of maritime 
el ectroni c devices and associ ated s oftware appli cations generally and who are not subject to 
government control. Full members are afforded full voting ri ghts and agree to be Members 
of the company for the purpos es of UK Company l egisl ation. Appli cants will not be abl e to 
exercise the ri ght to vote until the Board of Directors approves them as a Fu ll Member. 
Associ ate Member ship: open to any organiz ati on or company being a corporati on whi ch has 
s eparate l egal pers onali ty as noted above, whi ch has an interes t i n the field of maritime 
el ectroni c devices and associ ated applicati ons but does not compl y wi th the full membershi p 
criteri a becaus e they may be subject to government control. Associ ate members have no 
voting ri ghts wi thi n the CIRM communi ty. Page one o f two

• Members agree to non-disclosure of their unique password access to the CIRM website i.e. the person allocated the password will
